info.title: 7digital Locker API
info.description: Returns a paged list of releases and tracks for a user's locker (collection of all purchased tracks).

get.description: This method returns a list of artists from the 7digital catalogue whose names match the start letter(s) supplied.

parameters.name: artistId
parameters.description: unique identifier of the artist

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: nttttttt 2 letter ISO country code of the country whose releases you would like to searchntttttt

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: nttttttt The requested width of the image in pixelsntttttt

parameters.name: letter
parameters.description: The first letter(s) of the artist name to browse.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the result set. If not supplied, defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items to be returned per page. If not supplied this defaults to 10. Maximum page size is 50

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The time period for which the chart is generated. Default value is a week.

parameters.name: streamable
parameters.description: If provided search results will contain only releases that can/cannot be streamed

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The last day the chart should include data for. If not provided, by default the most recent chart for requested period will be returned.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Releases can be of type album, single or video. If specified, results are filtered by release type.

get.description: This endpoint returns a chart of the most purchased releases for given week. Only albums are included in this chart. To retrieve the most recent charts as published on 7digital.com the 'toDate' parameter should be omitted.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: nttttttt 2 letter ISO country code of the country whose releases you would like to viewntttttt

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: nttttttt The requested width of the image in pixelsntttttt

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the result set. If not supplied, defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items to be returned per page. If not supplied this defaults to 10. Maximum page size is 50

parameters.name: streamable
parameters.description: If provided search results will contain only releases that can/cannot be streamed

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The last day the chart should include data for. If not provided, it defaults to the most recent chart week.

get.description: This method returns a list of all available tags.

parameters.name: artistId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the artist.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: nttttttt2 letter ISO country code of the country whose artists you would like to searchntttttt

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: ntttttttThe requested width of the image in pixelsntttttt

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the result set. If not supplied, defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items to be returned per page. If not supplied this defaults to 10. Maximum page size is 50

parameters.name: streamable
parameters.description: If provided search results will contain only artists that can/cannot be streamed

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A single or comma separated list of tags.

get.description: This endpoint returns a chart of the most purchased tracks for given week. To retrieve the most recent charts as published on 7digital.com the 'toDate' parameter should be omitted.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: 2 letter ISO country code of the country whose tracks you would like to search

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: The requested width of the image in pixels

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the result set. If not supplied, defaults to 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items to be returned per page. If not supplied this defaults to 10. Maximum page size is 50

parameters.name: streamable
parameters.description: If provided search results will contain only tracks that can/cannot be streamed

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The last day the chart should include data for. If not provided, it defaults to the most recent chart week.

parameters.name: basketId
parameters.description: nttttttttThe unique identifier of the basket as acquired by basket/create methodnttttttt

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The code of the country the end user resides in. The country will default to GB if not provided.ntttt

get.description: Returns a list of all public playlists. If an oauth_token is provided then also given users' private playlists will be included in the response.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.description: Users OAuth access token - allows user to view Private playlist if it belongs to them

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: nttttttPage number of the result set. If not supplied, defaults to 1nttttt

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items to be returned per page. If not supplied, defaults to 10. Maximum page size is 500

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: This allows you to pass the id of a user you wish to view the playlists of a specific user. It must be in the format id:{userId}

get.description: Returns playlist details and track listing. Access to private playlists is only allowed when an oauth_token of the playlist owner is provided.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.description: Users OAuth access token - allows user to view private playlist if it belongs to them

post.description: Updates playlist details at {playlistId} with the supplied playlist details. It does not affect playlist tracks. Use this method e.g. for changing visibility of the playlist from private to public. The playlist details can only be updated by the playlist owner, i.e. oauth_token representing the user has to be provided.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.description: Users OAuth access token

delete.description: Removes the specified track {playlisttrackid} from the specified playlist at {playlistId}.  Tracks can only be removed by the playlist owner, i.e. oauth_token representing the user has to be provided.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.description: Users OAuth access token

get.description: Returns a paged list of releases and tracks for a user's locker (collection of all purchased tracks). This method must be OAuth signed.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The code of the country the end user resides in. The country will default to GB if not provided.nttt

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.description: users OAuth accesstoken

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: sets the page to be returned in paged list of the customers releases and tracks, by default this is the first page. page=1

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: sets the number of releases that will be returned per page, the default is 10, the maximum is 50

parameters.name: purchaseId
parameters.description: nttttt If supplied will return only the releases and tracks for that basket. Will return an error if no tracks are found.nttttt

parameters.name: releaseId
parameters.description: The 7digital ID of the release to be that we are interested in. You will use this to filter out and return a specific release from the users locker. Will return an empty locker response if no match is found.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: nttttttOrders the returned results. Supplied as a string in the format: {sortColumn} {sortOrder}, for example: purchaseDate desc ntttwill show recent purchases first. Currently you can sort by releaseTitle (asc or desc), purchaseDate (asc or desc) and artistName (asc or desc). If no sort is ntttsupplied, the default is releaseTitle asc. If no order is supplied the default is ascending.nttttt

parameters.name: trackId
parameters.description: nttttttIf supplied together with the releaseId, will returned only that specific track (provided it exists in user locker).nttttttWill return an empty locker response if no match is found.nttttt
